did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Mr. Harbrecht examines the 5 conditions necessary for labor to exercise power and concludes that the power of labor will continue to decline and that the union can survive as a power only by radically changing its character.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Mr. Harbrecht examines the 5 conditions necessary for labor to exercise power and concludes that the power of labor will continue to decline and that the union can survive as a power only by radically changing its character.
